Class Member

java.lang.Object
membership.Member
public class Member extends Object
Represents a gym member. Contains personal details and the associated membership card.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Member(String name, String phone, String email)
    Constructs a new Member with the given details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Member

      public Member(String name, String phone, String email)
      Constructs a new Member with the given details.
      Parameters:
      name - the member's full name
      phone - the member's phone number
      email - the member's email address
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null or empty

  • Method Details

    • registerMembership

      public void registerMembership(Card card)
      Registers a membership card for the member.
      Parameters:
      card - the membership card
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if card is null

    • getName

      public String getName()

    • getEmail

      public String getEmail()

    • getPhone

      public String getPhone()

    • getCard

      public Card getCard()

    • changePlan

      public void changePlan(boolean toVip)
      Changes the membership plan (VIP or regular).
      Parameters:
      toVip - true to upgrade to VIP, false to downgrade to regular
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if card is not registered

    • renewMembership

      public void renewMembership(int months)
      Renews the membership by extending the duration.
      Parameters:
      months - the number of months to extend
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no card is registered
      IllegalArgumentException - if months is not positive

    • reportLostCard

      public void reportLostCard()
      Reports the current membership card as lost. The card will be deactivated.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no card is registered

    • replaceCard

      public void replaceCard(String newCardNumber)
      Replaces the lost card with a new card if the old one is deactivated.
      Parameters:
      newCardNumber - the number of the new card
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if card is not deactivated or not registered
      IllegalArgumentException - if newCardNumber is invalid
